3.0.1.en: Fixed advanced device settings. Fixed device polling mode.

3.0.0.en: Rewrite to SDK3. Update athom-api@3.6.7. Capabilities, Insights and flow cards are migrated. Status indicator added.

2.6.0.en: Added support to set start date of year.

2.5.0.en: Added support for Homewizard water app (has daily reset water meter).

2.4.1.en: Fix hourly device restart. Improved watchdog.

2.4.0.en: Fix Daily reset production meters. Fix this day start settings. Increased app robustness. Added watchdog. Update athom-api@3.4.1

2.3.0.en: Fix Homey boot issues. Update athom-api@3.3.0

2.2.0.en: Added support for Tibber app. Added support for Homewizard energylink gas. Check for source device unavailable. Added polling mode for power (reduced system load in combination with Prometheus exporter). Removed deprecated meter driver. Update athom-api@3.2.13.

2.1.1.en: Added support for Solar Panels app. Update athom-api@3.2.7.

2.1.0.en: Added support for Solar Panels app. Update athom-api@3.2.7.

2.0.1.en: Added gas and water drivers. Added Sum per year (only for newly added devices). Upgrade athom-api@3.1.20.

0.2.0.en: Bugfixes and added support for Open Toon
